text: need to join an Amazon chime meeting
this video shows you a few ways to do it
from the Amazon chime app the easiest
way is to be signed into your Amazon
chime account on at least one device
sign in at least one minute before the
meeting is scheduled to start at the
start time you'll hear Amazon chime
ringing on a computer in the join screen
choose answer after joining choose your
audio choose use mic and speakers if you
are the only audio source in the room
use disable mic and speakers if there is
another user in the room using their
audio or you are joining using an
in-room video system you can participate
in the video and/or screen share choose
the dial-in tab and Amazon chime will
connect you to the meeting and then
present you with a phone number and
meeting pin to use for audio now you're
on the call if you're going to be
running late notify the meeting
attendees by choosing running late and
then choose the number of minutes you'll
be late this number appears next to your
name in the call roster and counts down
Amazon chime calls you back after the
selected number of minutes has passed if
you miss the call notification don't
worry as long as the call is active you
can join the meeting choose meeting and
then join a meeting the screen shows all
the meetings and progress are starting
in the next 30 minutes
select your meeting from the list and
choose join
from this same screen you can also join
by entering the host meeting ID this can
be helpful if there is already a call in
progress and you are being asked to join
the experience is the same on your
mobile device when the meeting starts
you'll receive a notification or the
joint screen will pop up from the
meeting screen choose answer then choose
use my audio don't use my audio or dial
in when you choose dial in from your
mobile device
Amazon chime shows you the number it is
going to dial and when you select call
dials the number and enters the meeting
pin for you
if you are running late notify the
meeting attendees by choosing running
late and then choose the number of
minutes you'll be late if you miss the
call from Amazon chime app navigate to
the meetings tab select your meeting
from the list or choose join and enter
the hosts meeting ID and that's how you
join from the Amazon chimey have a great
meeting
